name: Make Way Out
description:
Make Way Out is a game about annoying people who live on a square. Your lover is the dashing person in red, and you wish you could get some time alone with them, away from all of your nosey peers.

Press W/S or Up/Down to move forward or backward. Press A/D or Left/Right to turn. Press space to (temporarily) get some alone time with ur lover. But be careful, when people realize what you're doing, they're going to get real curious!

My high score is 86
